title: Time Lord’s Injury, Unlucky Lakers, the Slap, and More With Bill Simmons
description:
Logan and Raja catch up on their separate exploits in New York City (1:00), before Bill Simmons hops on to talk about Robert Williams’s torn meniscus, the Lakers' mess, Will Smith’s slap heard around the world, and much more (22:00).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Bill Simmons
Producers: Sasha Ashall and Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
